PROJECT(SLIVR)

IF(UNIX AND NOT APPLE AND NOT CYGWIN)
  SET(ENABLE_PIC ON)
ENDIF(UNIX AND NOT APPLE AND NOT CYGWIN)
  
ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DGLEW_STATIC)

# -- Source files the lib depends upon. --
# none of the following depend on GLEW
SET(SLIVR_SRCS
  BBox.cc
  Plane.cc
  Point.cc
  Ray.cc
  Transform.cc
  Vector.cc
  Color.cc
  ColorMap.cc
  ColorMap2.cc
  CM2Shader.cc
  CM2Widget.cc
  ShaderProgramARB.cc
  SliceRenderer.cc
  SurfaceRenderer.cc
  Texture.cc
  TextureBrick.cc
  TextureRenderer.cc
  VideoCardInfo.c
  VolShader.cc
  VolumeRenderer.cc
  )


SET(SCI_SLIVR_LIBRARY slivr CACHE INTERNAL "Slivr library name." FORCE)
SET(SCI_SLIVR_INCLUDE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/.. CACHE INTERNAL "Slivr include directories." FORCE)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
                    ${SCI_SLIVR_INCLUDE}
                    ${SCI_GLEW_INCLUDE}
                    ${SCI_TEEM_INCLUDE}
                   )

ADD_LIBRARY(${SCI_SLIVR_LIBRARY} STATIC ${SLIVR_SRCS})

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${SCI_SLIVR_LIBRARY}
                      ${SCI_GLEW_LIBRARY}
                      ${SCI_TEEM_LIBRARY}
                      ${GL_LIBRARY}
                    )

IF(ENABLE_PIC)
  SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(${SCI_SLIVR_LIBRARY}
                        PROPERTIES
                        COMPILE_FLAGS "-fPIC")
ENDIF(ENABLE_PIC)


IF(CMAKE_COMPILER_IS_GNUCC)
  SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(${SCI_SLIVR_LIBRARY}
                        PROPERTIES
                        COMPILE_FLAGS "-w")
ENDIF(CMAKE_COMPILER_IS_GNUCC)
